titleStmt.title: The excellency and lawfulnesse of the Solemne league and covenant. Set forth in a speech, or exhortation made by Mr. Phillip Nye to the Honorable House of Commons and reverend assembly of ministers at their taking the said Solemne league and covenant.
titleStmt.author: Nye, Philip, 1596?-1672.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. Wilson, for Tho. Vnderhill, at the signe of the Bible in Wood-street.,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "Jan: 26 1645"; the second 6 in imprint date crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Bible in Wood-street.
